title: Did you remove the ability to access client chat while in game/loading screen?
body:
I was able to alt tab during loadscreen or in game and access the LoL client to chat with people while waiting for game to load etc.

I can't do that anymore.

replies.body: You might have [Close Client During Game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled, which exits the client to reduce stress during a match.  If you have it checked, removing that should keep it up while your game loads.
